blurry-battle.title: Blurry Battle
blurry-battle.heroText: How well can you read blurry text? Test your eyesight and compete with friends in this fun and challenging game! Best played with 1-4 players.

burning-bridges.title: Burning Bridges
burning-bridges.heroText: Burning Bridges is an activity that stirs up lively conversations with AI prompts that might even challenge friendships. Dive in and see if your bonds can withstand the heat!
instructions: Join the game on any device, preferably a phone.
Sit in a circle and pass the device between players in a clockwise manner.
Without revealing to the others, each player should press and hold a button to reveal the card's description.
Point to the player who fits the description. The two will then engage in a game of scissors-paper-stone until someone wins.
If the player with the device loses, they will have to reveal the description to everyone.
Pass the device to the next person and continue at step 4.

color-guessr.title: Color Guessr
color-guessr.heroText: See how well you can guess color hexcodes! Score points based on how close you are the to answer. Best played with 1-4 players.

convo-starter.title: Convo Starter
convo-starter.heroText: Dive into fascinating questions, fun challenges, and engaging prompts generated by ChatGPT. Ignite connections and make every chat memorable!
instructions: Join the game on any device, preferably a phone.
Pick a topic to talk about and share your experiences. Feel free to keep it lightheated and fun, and encourage open and honest sharing!

data-hedger.title: Data Hedger
data-hedger.heroText: Pick the card you think will win the most fields! Don't pick the most popular choice. Best played with 3-8 players.

frequency-guessr.title: Frequency Guessr
frequency-guessr.heroText: Guess the frequency of the given sound. The closer you are to the actual frequency, the more points you get! Best played with 1-4 players.

location-guessr.title: Location Guessr
location-guessr.heroText: Test your geography skills by guessing where the location is. Make the closest guess to gain the point! Best played with 3-8 players.

math-attack.title: Math Attack
math-attack.heroText: Stay within the bounds and be the last player standing in this math-based card game. Best played with 2-6 players.

midpoint-master.title: Midpoint Master
midpoint-master.heroText: Become the midpoint of your friends' guesses in this fun and engaging game. Best played with 3-12 players.

number-nightmare.title: Number Nightmare
number-nightmare.heroText: Pick a number that will satisfy the most conditions! Try to be unique with your choice. Best played with 1-6 players.

quip-ai.title: Quip AI
quip-ai.heroText: Come up with the funniest responses for our AI-generated prompts and vote for the best one! Best played with 3-8 players.
instructions: Join the game on any device, preferably a phone.
Read the prompt and come up with the funniest response.

stat-attack.title: Stat Attack
stat-attack.heroText: Strategically arrange your cards to outwit your opponents, becoming the ultimate Stat Attack champion! Best played with 2-6 players.

stat-guessr.title: Stat Guessr
stat-guessr.heroText: Guess the statistics of the given data. The closer you are to the actual statistics, the more points you get! Best played with 1-4 players.

truth-or-dare.title: Truth or Dare
truth-or-dare.heroText: Get ready for a night of fun and laughter with Truth or Dare! Are you gonna pick truth? Or dare? Best played with 3-6 players.
instructions: Join the game on any device, preferably a phone.
Sit in a circle and pass the device between players in a clockwise manner.
